title: Engineer II
summary: Developed and enhanced applications for American Express partners and internal teams using React.js, Spring Boot, and Node.js. Involved in writing new features, debugging, and effectively communicating with stakeholders.
points: Built a transaction search UI to streamline data access for internal teams.
Enhanced user management systems to enable secure onboarding and role-based access for 60+ network partners, along with upgrading dispute management systems to improve transaction dispute resolution.

Containerized a monolith application using Docker, reducing deployment time by 50% and minimizing errors. The application facilitates partner onboarding and acts as an information hub for network partners.

title: Solution Engineer
summary: At Nokia, I honed my skills in core Java and frontend technologies, contributing to major projects for clients like AT&T and Verizon. This experience laid a solid foundation in enterprise-level software development and teamwork.
points: Developed core Java products to automate auditing of configurations for Nokia's mobile network services, enhancing efficiency.
Created a responsive UI for Nokia partners to request special features on Nokia Mobile Networks using React.js and Redux.
